title: Assignment 3 - Request-Response Cycle
description: This assignment is worth 10 points. 5 points come from the instructor, 3 points come from your peers and 2 points come from you grading other student's submissions.  You cannot see or grade other students assignments until you have turned in your assignment.  You cannot re-submit your assignment unless the instructor allows you to resubmit. Make sure to make JPG or PNG files and keep them less than 1MB.
grading: Please review carefully.  The actual points are less important and useful comments about what might be wrong and need fixing.
